original_title: Kolá San Jon é Festa di Kau Berdi
overview: This documentary follows a group of habitants from Cova da Moura neighborhood into a journey to Cape Verde, to celebrate St. John festivities. Recovering the rituals and rhythms of these festivities, the cape verdean people living in that neighborhood near Lisbon, try to recover their roots and transmit it to their children.
title: Kolá San Jon é Festa di Kau Berdi
